text: A map of Athens Metro lines currently in operation The Athens Metro is a rapid transit system serving Athens, the capital of Greece, and parts of East Attica. There are 64 stations in total in 3 lines. ==Lines== {| class="sortable wikitable" |+ Athens Metro lines ! Line ! class="unsortable" |Map colour ! First section opened ! ! Latest section opened !
